column5: Hey everyone,  Seeing as though bass season is exactly 3 weeks away, I am getting the itch!  Does anyone know if there are any bass tournaments on Stoney Lake Saturday, June 28?  Cheers, *Stoty

From my understanding most of the tourneys have gone away from opening day events. Although prefishing an opening day tournament is not allowed they decided to avoid the possibility of any anglers being on the lakes "scouting".
Makes sense. Then again, anyone who has gone crappie/walleye fishing should know where the fish are right now! ahhah.  I was just hoping to find a "local" tournament or something to fish.
Bassmania 2008: BM Wildcards  Lake Date Venue Cost  Simcoe Casey Cup  June 29 Centennial Park, Orillia $300.00 per team  Tri-Lakes July 27 Rotary Park, Bridgenorth $300.00 per team
Hmm wonder how many ppl in this board fish Stoney, maybe we could try organizing an OFC tourney for next year...
